Package classifiers

Class KMeansClassifier.Cluster

java.lang.Object
classifiers.KMeansClassifier.Cluster
Enclosing class:
KMeansClassifier
public static class KMeansClassifier.Cluster extends Object
The Cluster class represents a cluster formed by the K-means algorithm.

  • Field Details

    • centroid

      private KMeansClassifier.Centroid centroid
      Represents the center of a cluster.

    • samples

      private final List<Sample> samples
      List of the samples contained in the cluster.

    • centerPoint

      private List<Float> centerPoint
      Represents the center point of the cluster. It is given by the computing the mean coordinates of all samples belonging to the cluster. Is used as the coordinates of the new centroid.

    • previousCenterPoint

      private List<Float> previousCenterPoint
      Represents the centerPoint of the last state of the cluster.

    • getCenterPoint

      public List<Float> getCenterPoint()
      Gets the attribute means of the cluster.
      Returns:
      The list of attribute means.

    • computeClusterCenter

      public void computeClusterCenter()
      Computes the center point of the cluster by averaging each coordinate of every sample in the cluster.

    • hasNotChanged

      private boolean hasNotChanged()
      Checks if the cluster's attribute means have converged.
      Returns:
      True if attribute means have converged, false otherwise.
